title: Care Plan
description: Healthcare plan for patient or group. (Based on HL7 FHIR Release 5 specifications)

fhir:instantiatesCanonical.title: Instantiates Canonical
fhir:instantiatesCanonical.description: The URL pointing to a FHIR-defined protocol, guideline, questionnaire or other definition that is adhered to in whole or in part by this CarePlan.

fhir:instantiatesUri.title: Instantiates Uri
fhir:instantiatesUri.description: The URL pointing to an externally maintained protocol, guideline, questionnaire or other definition that is adhered to in whole or in part by this CarePlan.

fhir:basedOn.title: Based On
fhir:basedOn.description: A higher-level request resource (i.e. a plan, proposal or order) that is fulfilled in whole or in part by this care plan.

fhir:replaces.title: Replaces
fhir:replaces.description: Completed or terminated care plan whose function is taken by this new care plan.

fhir:partOf.title: Part Of
fhir:partOf.description: A larger care plan of which this particular care plan is a component or step.

fhir:status.title: Status
fhir:status.description: draft | active | on-hold | revoked | completed | entered-in-error | unknown

fhir:title.title: Title
fhir:title.description: Human-friendly name for the care plan.

fhir:subject.title: Subject
fhir:subject.description: Identifies the patient or group whose intended care is described by the plan.

fhir:encounter.title: Encounter
fhir:encounter.description: The Encounter during which this CarePlan was created.

fhir:custodian.title: Custodian
fhir:custodian.description: The custodian for the care plan.

fhir:contributor.title: Contributor
fhir:contributor.description: Identifies the individual(s), organization or device who provided the contents of the care plan.

fhir:careTeam.title: Care Team
fhir:careTeam.description: Identifies all people and organizations who are expected to be involved in the care envisioned by this plan.

fhir:supportingInfo.title: Supporting Info
fhir:supportingInfo.description: Information considered as part of plan.

fhir:goal.title: Goal
fhir:goal.description: Describes the intended objective(s) of carrying out the care plan.

fhir:activity.title: Activity
fhir:activity.description: Action to occur or has occurred as part of plan.

xdm:performedActivity.title: Performed Activity
xdm:performedActivity.description: Results of the activity (concept, or Appointment, Encounter, Procedure, etc.).

xdm:progress.title: Progress
xdm:progress.description: Notes about the adherence/status/progress of the activity.

xdm:plannedActivityReference.title: Planned Activity Reference
xdm:plannedActivityReference.description: Activity that is intended to be part of the care plan.

fhir:note.title: Note
fhir:note.description: General notes about the care plan.
